logout_message: Are you sure you want to logout from the system?

http-request-error.304: The password and/or email is/are incorrect
http-request-error.400: Incorrect Data Please check that your data are correct. If the problem persists, please contact Technical Support Team.
http-request-error.401: You have an authorization problem. If the problem persists, please contact the Technical Support Team or the administration.
http-request-error.403: You do not have sufficient right of access to these data
http-request-error.422: The provided data can not be process because you have some duplicate entries
http-request-error.500: An unknown error occurred. If the problem persists, please contact the Technical Support Team or the administration.
